resources.string: Please take a look at Parkinson mPower, a research study app about Parkinson Disease. Download it for Android at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.sagebase.mpower
You now have the ability to create your own survey question. Tap Next to enter your question.

Creating a custom question will help you track something personal to you over time. Think about something you care deeply about and would like to see how your performance in that area changes with your post-treatment evolution. Some examples may include: - How was your morning run today? - My work day today was...
We will track your question in the dashboard (shown as "Custom Question") over time. Remember that you can always go to your profile and change this question.
Your results will be displayed on the dashboard when ready.
Enter a custom question that you would like to track.
